c)/lam`. set lamStar : Real := min (u - 1) ((y - c) / lam - 1) have hlamStar_le_u : lamStar u := by have : lamStar u - 1 := min_le_left _ _ linarith have hlamStar_lt_div : lamStar < (y - c) / lam := by have : lamStar (y - Completing the square for the elliptic quadratic inequality.

lemma section13_ellipticSet_completeSquare_mem {n : Nat} (Q : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ) (a : Fin n ) ( : ) (hQ : Q.PosDef) : let C : Set (Fin n ) := {x | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) + dotProduct a x + 0} let b : Fin n := -((Q).mulVec a) let : := (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a) - x, x C (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct (x - b) (Q.mulVec (x - b)) := by classical intro C b x have hQdet : IsUnit Q.det := (Matrix.isUnit_iff_isUnit_det (A := Q)).1 (by simpa using hQ.isUnit) have hQsymm : Q.transpose = Q := by -- For real matrices, `IsHermitian` is `transpose` symmetry. simpa [Matrix.conjTranspose_eq_transpose_of_trivial] using (show Q.conjTranspose = Q from hQ.1) have hQ_mul_inv : Q * Q = 1 := Matrix.mul_nonsing_inv Q hQdet set d : Fin n := (Q).mulVec a with hd have hQd : Q.mulVec d = a := by calc Q.mulVec d = (Q * Q).mulVec a := by simp [d, Matrix.mulVec_mulVec] _ = a := by simp [hQ_mul_inv] have hdot_dx : dotProduct d (Q.mulVec x) = dotProduct a x := by calc dotProduct d (Q.mulVec x) = dotProduct (Q.transpose.mulVec d) x := by simpa using (section13_dotProduct_mulVec_right (A := Q) (x := d) (y := x)) _ = dotProduct (Q.mulVec d) x := by simp [hQsymm] _ = dotProduct a x := by simp [hQd] have hdot_xd : dotProduct x (Q.mulVec d) = dotProduct a x := by calc dotProduct x (Q.mulVec d) = dotProduct (Q.mulVec d) x := by simpa using (dotProduct_comm x (Q.mulVec d)) _ = dotProduct a x := by simp [hQd] have hdot_dd : dotProduct d (Q.mulVec d) = dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a) := by calc dotProduct d (Q.mulVec d) = dotProduct d a := by simp [hQd] _ = dotProduct a d := by simpa using (dotProduct_comm d a) _ = dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a) := by simp [d] have hxb : x - b = x + d := by simp [b, d, sub_eq_add_neg] have hexpand : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct (x - b) (Q.mulVec (x - b)) = (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) + dotProduct a x + (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a) := by have hquad : dotProduct (x + d) (Q.mulVec (x + d)) = dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) + dotProduct a x + dotProduct a x + dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a) := by calc dotProduct (x + d) (Q.mulVec (x + d)) = dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) + dotProduct x (Q.mulVec d) + dotProduct d (Q.mulVec x) + dotProduct d (Q.mulVec d) := by simp [Matrix.mulVec_add, dotProduct_add, add_dotProduct, add_assoc, add_left_comm, add_comm] _ = dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) + dotProduct a x + dotProduct a x + dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a) := by simp [hdot_dx, hdot_xd, hdot_dd, add_assoc, add_comm] calc (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct (x - b) (Q.mulVec (x - b)) = (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct (x + d) (Q.mulVec (x + d)) := by simp [hxb] _ = (1 / 2 : ) * (dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) + dotProduct a x + dotProduct a x + dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a)) := by simp [hquad] _ = (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) + dotProduct a x + (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a) := by ring constructor intro hxC have hxC' : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) + dotProduct a x + 0 := by simpa [C] using hxC have : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct (x - b) (Q.mulVec (x - b)) (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a) - := by -- Rearrange using the expansion. have := hxC' linarith [hexpand] simpa [] using this intro hx have hx' : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct (x - b) (Q.mulVec (x - b)) (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a) - := by simpa [] using hx have : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) + dotProduct a x + 0 := by linarith [hexpand, hx'] simpa [C] using this

Nonemptiness of the elliptic set forces the radius parameter Unknown identifier `` to be nonnegative.

lemma section13_beta_nonneg_of_nonempty {n : Nat} (Q : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ) (a : Fin n ) ( : ) (hQ : Q.PosDef) : let C : Set (Fin n ) := {x | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) + dotProduct a x + 0} let : := (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a) - Set.Nonempty C 0 := by classical dsimp intro hCne let b : Fin n := -((Q).mulVec a) rcases hCne with x, hxC have hx : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct (x - b) (Q.mulVec (x - b)) (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a) - := by simpa [b] using (section13_ellipticSet_completeSquare_mem (Q := Q) (a := a) ( := ) hQ (x := x)).1 hxC have hnonneg : 0 (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct (x - b) (Q.mulVec (x - b)) := by have : 0 dotProduct (x - b) (Q.mulVec (x - b)) := section13_posDef_dotProduct_mulVec_nonneg (hQ := hQ) (x := x - b) nlinarith exact le_trans hnonneg hx

The set is a scaling of the unit Euclidean ball.

lemma section13_setOf_half_dotProduct_self_le_eq_smul_unitEuclideanBall {n : Nat} ( : ) (h : 0 ) : {z : Fin n | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct z z } = (Real.sqrt (2 * )) {y : Fin n | Real.sqrt (dotProduct y y) (1 : )} := by classical set lam : := Real.sqrt (2 * ) have h2 : 0 2 * := by nlinarith [h] have hlam_nonneg : 0 lam := by simp [lam] ext z constructor intro hz have hz' : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct z z := by simpa using hz have hz2 : dotProduct z z 2 * := by nlinarith [hz'] by_cases hlam0 : lam = 0 have h20 : 2 * = 0 := by have : Real.sqrt (2 * ) = 0 := by simpa [lam] using hlam0 exact (Real.sqrt_eq_zero h2).1 this have hz0 : z = 0 := by have hnn : 0 dotProduct z z := by simpa using (dotProduct_self_star_nonneg z) have hle0 : dotProduct z z 0 := by simpa [h20] using hz2 have hz00 : dotProduct z z = 0 := le_antisymm hle0 hnn exact dotProduct_self_eq_zero.1 hz00 refine (Set.mem_smul_set).2 0, by simp, ?_ simp [hz0, lam, hlam0] have hlam_pos : 0 < lam := lt_of_le_of_ne hlam_nonneg (Ne.symm hlam0) let y : Fin n := (1 / lam) z have hy_le : dotProduct y y (1 : ) := by have hy : dotProduct y y = (1 / lam) ^ 2 * dotProduct z z := by simp [y, smul_dotProduct, dotProduct_smul, smul_eq_mul, pow_two, mul_left_comm, mul_comm] have hmul : (1 / lam) ^ 2 * dotProduct z z (1 / lam) ^ 2 * (2 * ) := by have hnonneg : 0 (1 / lam) ^ 2 := by nlinarith [hlam_pos.le] exact mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left hz2 hnonneg have hscale : (1 / lam) ^ 2 * (2 * ) = 1 := by have hlam_sq : lam ^ 2 = 2 * := by simpa [lam] using (Real.sq_sqrt h2) calc (1 / lam) ^ 2 * (2 * ) = (1 / lam) ^ 2 * (lam ^ 2) := by simp [hlam_sq] _ = 1 := by simp [pow_two, mul_assoc, mul_comm, hlam_pos.ne'] have : dotProduct y y 1 := by have := le_trans hmul (le_of_eq hscale) simpa [hy] using this simpa using this have hyB : y {y : Fin n | Real.sqrt (dotProduct y y) (1 : )} := by have : Real.sqrt (dotProduct y y) (1 : ) := by refine (Real.sqrt_le_left (x := dotProduct y y) (y := (1 : )) (by norm_num)).2 ?_ simpa using hy_le simpa using this refine (Set.mem_smul_set).2 y, hyB, ?_ have hne : lam 0 := hlam_pos.ne' simp [y, smul_smul, one_div, hne] rintro hz rcases (Set.mem_smul_set).1 hz with y, hyB, rfl have hy_le : dotProduct y y (1 : ) := by have hy_sqrt : Real.sqrt (dotProduct y y) (1 : ) := by simpa using hyB have := (Real.sqrt_le_left (x := dotProduct y y) (y := (1 : )) (by norm_num)).1 hy_sqrt simpa [pow_two] using this have hsq : lam ^ 2 = 2 * := by simpa [lam] using (Real.sq_sqrt h2) have hz2 : dotProduct (lam y) (lam y) 2 * := by have hdot : dotProduct (lam y) (lam y) = lam ^ 2 * dotProduct y y := by simp [smul_dotProduct, dotProduct_smul, smul_eq_mul, pow_two, mul_left_comm, mul_comm] nlinarith [hy_le, hdot, hsq] have : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct (lam y) (lam y) := by nlinarith [hz2] simpa [lam] using this

Boundedness in direction Unknown identifier `xStar`xStar for the centered ellipsoid .

lemma section13_bddAbove_image_dotProduct_centeredSublevel_posDef {n : Nat} (Q : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ) ( : ) (xStar : Fin n ) (hQ : Q.PosDef) (h : 0 ) : BddAbove (Set.image (fun x : Fin n => dotProduct x xStar) {x : Fin n | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) }) := by classical rcases section13_posDef_exists_isUnit_transpose_mul_self (Q := Q) hQ with M, hM, hQeq have hMdet : IsUnit M.det := (Matrix.isUnit_iff_isUnit_det (A := M)).1 hM have hMinvMul : M * M = 1 := Matrix.nonsing_inv_mul M hMdet have hMmulInv : M * M = 1 := Matrix.mul_nonsing_inv M hMdet set D : Set (Fin n ) := {x : Fin n | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) } set Ball : Set (Fin n ) := {y : Fin n | Real.sqrt (dotProduct y y) (1 : )} set lam : := Real.sqrt (2 * ) set w : Fin n := (M).transpose.mulVec xStar refine lam * Real.sqrt (dotProduct w w), ?_ intro r hr rcases hr with x, hxD, rfl -- Let `z = M x`, so `x = M z` and `z` lies in the scaled unit ball. set z : Fin n := M.mulVec x have hxpre : x = (M).mulVec z := by have : (M).mulVec z = x := by calc (M).mulVec z = (M).mulVec (M.mulVec x) := by simp [z] _ = (M * M).mulVec x := by simp [Matrix.mulVec_mulVec] _ = x := by simp [hMinvMul] simpa using this.symm have hz_mem : z lam Ball := by -- Transfer the quadratic inequality to `z`. have hquad : dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) = dotProduct z z := by calc dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) = dotProduct x ((M.transpose * M).mulVec x) := by simp [hQeq] _ = dotProduct x (M.transpose.mulVec (M.mulVec x)) := by simp [Matrix.mulVec_mulVec] _ = dotProduct z z := by have := (section13_dotProduct_mulVec_right (A := M.transpose) (x := x) (y := M.mulVec x)) simpa [z] using this have hz' : z {z : Fin n | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct z z } := by have hx' : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) := by simpa [D] using hxD -- membership in `{z | ...}` is the defining inequality simpa [hquad] using hx' -- Use the ball characterization lemma. have hball : {z : Fin n | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct z z } = lam Ball := by simpa [lam, Ball] using (section13_setOf_half_dotProduct_self_le_eq_smul_unitEuclideanBall (n := n) ( := ) h) -- rewrite the defining set as a scaled ball rw [ hball] exact hz' -- Bound the dot product via the unit-ball bound. have hzmem : z ({(0 : Fin n )} : Set (Fin n )) + (lam Ball) := by simpa using (Set.add_mem_add (show (0 : Fin n ) ({(0 : Fin n )} : Set (Fin n )) by simp) hz_mem) have hbound := section13_dotProduct_le_dotProduct_add_mul_sqrt_of_mem_singleton_add_smul_unitEuclideanBall (n := n) (a := (0 : Fin n )) (x := w) (z := z) (lam := lam) (hlam := by simp [lam]) (by simpa [Ball] using hzmem) have hdot : dotProduct x xStar = dotProduct w z := by -- `xStar (M z) = (M xStar) z` calc dotProduct x xStar = dotProduct ((M).mulVec z) xStar := by simp [hxpre] _ = dotProduct xStar ((M).mulVec z) := by simp [dotProduct_comm] _ = dotProduct w z := by simpa [w] using (section13_dotProduct_mulVec_right (A := M) (x := xStar) (y := z)) -- Conclude. simpa [hdot, dotProduct_comm, w, lam, z] using hbound

Support function of the centered ellipsoid for positive definite Unknown identifier `Q`Q.

lemma section13_deltaStar_centeredSublevel_posDef {n : Nat} (Q : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ) ( : ) (xStar : Fin n ) (hQ : Q.PosDef) (h : 0 ) : deltaStar {x : Fin n | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) } xStar = Real.sqrt (2 * * dotProduct xStar ((Q).mulVec xStar)) := by classical rcases section13_posDef_exists_isUnit_transpose_mul_self (Q := Q) hQ with M, hM, hQeq have hMdet : IsUnit M.det := (Matrix.isUnit_iff_isUnit_det (A := M)).1 hM have hMinvMul : M * M = 1 := Matrix.nonsing_inv_mul M hMdet have hMmulInv : M * M = 1 := Matrix.mul_nonsing_inv M hMdet set Ball : Set (Fin n ) := {y : Fin n | Real.sqrt (dotProduct y y) (1 : )} set lam : := Real.sqrt (2 * ) have hlam : 0 lam := by simp [lam] -- Express the ellipsoid as a linear image of `lam Ball`. have hball : {z : Fin n | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct z z } = lam Ball := by simpa [lam, Ball] using (section13_setOf_half_dotProduct_self_le_eq_smul_unitEuclideanBall (n := n) ( := ) h) have hD : {x : Fin n | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) } = (fun z => (M).mulVec z) '' (lam Ball) := by ext x constructor intro hx set z : Fin n := M.mulVec x have hxpre : x = (M).mulVec z := by have : (M).mulVec z = x := by calc (M).mulVec z = (M).mulVec (M.mulVec x) := by simp [z] _ = (M * M).mulVec x := by simp [Matrix.mulVec_mulVec] _ = x := by simp [hMinvMul] simpa using this.symm have hquad : dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) = dotProduct z z := by calc dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) = dotProduct x ((M.transpose * M).mulVec x) := by simp [hQeq] _ = dotProduct x (M.transpose.mulVec (M.mulVec x)) := by simp [Matrix.mulVec_mulVec] _ = dotProduct z z := by have := (section13_dotProduct_mulVec_right (A := M.transpose) (x := x) (y := M.mulVec x)) simpa [z] using this have hz : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct z z := by simpa [hquad] using hx have hzmem : z lam Ball := by rw [ hball] exact hz exact z, hzmem, hxpre.symm rintro z, hz, rfl have hz' : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct z z := by have hzset : z {z : Fin n | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct z z } := by -- Rewrite the goal to match `hz : z lam Ball`. rw [hball] exact hz simpa using hzset have hMz : M.mulVec ((M).mulVec z) = z := by calc M.mulVec ((M).mulVec z) = (M * M).mulVec z := by simp [Matrix.mulVec_mulVec] _ = z := by simp [hMmulInv] have hquad : dotProduct ((M).mulVec z) (Q.mulVec ((M).mulVec z)) = dotProduct z z := by have hQmul : Q.mulVec ((M).mulVec z) = M.transpose.mulVec z := by calc Q.mulVec ((M).mulVec z) = (M.transpose * M).mulVec ((M).mulVec z) := by simp [hQeq] _ = M.transpose.mulVec (M.mulVec ((M).mulVec z)) := by simp [Matrix.mulVec_mulVec, Matrix.mul_assoc] _ = M.transpose.mulVec z := by simp [hMz] calc dotProduct ((M).mulVec z) (Q.mulVec ((M).mulVec z)) = dotProduct ((M).mulVec z) (M.transpose.mulVec z) := by simp [hQmul] _ = dotProduct (M.mulVec ((M).mulVec z)) z := by simpa using (section13_dotProduct_mulVec_right (A := M.transpose) (x := (M).mulVec z) (y := z)) _ = dotProduct z z := by simp [hMz] have : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct ((M).mulVec z) (Q.mulVec ((M).mulVec z)) := by simpa [hquad.symm] using hz' simpa using this -- Reduce via the linear-image lemma and the unit-ball formula. calc deltaStar {x : Fin n | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) } xStar = deltaStar ((fun z => (M).mulVec z) '' (lam Ball)) xStar := by simpa using congrArg (fun S : Set (Fin n ) => deltaStar S xStar) hD _ = deltaStar (lam Ball) ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) := by simpa using (section13_deltaStar_image_mulVec (A := M) (C := lam Ball) (xStar := xStar)) _ = Real.sqrt (2 * * dotProduct xStar ((Q).mulVec xStar)) := by -- Use the unit-ball support function and rewrite the induced quadratic form. have hBallSupp : deltaStar (lam Ball) ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) = lam * Real.sqrt (dotProduct ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar)) := by have h0 : deltaStar (({(0 : Fin n )} : Set (Fin n )) + (lam Ball)) ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) = dotProduct ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) (0 : Fin n ) + lam * Real.sqrt (dotProduct ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar)) := by simpa [Ball] using (deltaStar_singleton_add_smul_unitEuclideanBall (n := n) (a := (0 : Fin n )) (x := (M).transpose.mulVec xStar) (lam := lam) hlam) simpa [zero_add, add_zero] using h0 -- Identify `Q` with `M * (M)`. have hMinv : (M.transpose * M) = M * (M.transpose) := by apply Matrix.inv_eq_right_inv have hMTdet : IsUnit M.transpose.det := Matrix.isUnit_det_transpose (A := M) hMdet have hMmulInv' : M * M = 1 := Matrix.mul_nonsing_inv M hMdet have hMTmulInv : M.transpose * (M.transpose) = 1 := Matrix.mul_nonsing_inv M.transpose hMTdet calc (M.transpose * M) * (M * (M.transpose)) = M.transpose * (M * M) * (M.transpose) := by simp [Matrix.mul_assoc] _ = 1 := by simp [hMmulInv', hMTmulInv] have hQinv : Q = M * (M).transpose := by have hMTinv : (M.transpose) = (M).transpose := by -- `transpose` commutes with nonsingular inverse. simpa using (Matrix.transpose_nonsing_inv (A := M)).symm calc Q = (M.transpose * M) := by simp [hQeq] _ = M * (M.transpose) := hMinv _ = M * (M).transpose := by simp [hMTinv] have h2 : 0 2 * := by nlinarith [h] have hdot : dotProduct ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) = dotProduct xStar ((Q).mulVec xStar) := by have htmp : dotProduct xStar ((M * (M).transpose).mulVec xStar) = dotProduct ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) := by simpa [Matrix.mulVec_mulVec] using (section13_dotProduct_mulVec_right (A := M) (x := xStar) (y := (M).transpose.mulVec xStar)) calc dotProduct ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) = dotProduct xStar ((M * (M).transpose).mulVec xStar) := by simpa using htmp.symm _ = dotProduct xStar ((Q).mulVec xStar) := by simp [hQinv] have hsqrt : lam * Real.sqrt (dotProduct xStar ((Q).mulVec xStar)) = Real.sqrt (2 * * dotProduct xStar ((Q).mulVec xStar)) := by have := (Real.sqrt_mul h2 (dotProduct xStar ((Q).mulVec xStar))).symm simpa [lam, mul_assoc] using this -- Finish. have : deltaStar (lam Ball) ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) = Real.sqrt (2 * * dotProduct xStar ((Q).mulVec xStar)) := by -- Start from the unit-ball formula. have : deltaStar (lam Ball) ((M).transpose.mulVec xStar) = lam * Real.sqrt (dotProduct xStar ((Q).mulVec xStar)) := by simpa [hdot, hQinv] using hBallSupp simpa [hsqrt] using this simpa using this

Text 13.5.2: For the elliptic convex set

,

where Unknown identifier `Q`Q is a positive definite symmetric matrix, one has (assuming Unknown identifier `C`sorry : PropC )

,

where Unknown identifier `b`sorry = -sorry : Propb = -Unknown identifier `Q`Q a and .

theorem deltaStar_ellipticSet_eq {n : Nat} (Q : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ) (a : Fin n ) ( : ) (xStar : Fin n ) (hQ : Q.PosDef) : let C : Set (Fin n ) := {x | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) + dotProduct a x + 0} let b : Fin n := -((Q).mulVec a) let : := (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct a ((Q).mulVec a) - Set.Nonempty C deltaStar C xStar = dotProduct xStar b + Real.sqrt (2 * * dotProduct xStar ((Q).mulVec xStar)) := by classical intro C b hCne have hnonneg : 0 := by simpa [C, b, ] using (section13_beta_nonneg_of_nonempty (Q := Q) (a := a) ( := ) hQ (by simpa [C] using hCne)) let D : Set (Fin n ) := {x : Fin n | (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) } have hcomp : x, x C (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct (x - b) (Q.mulVec (x - b)) := by simpa [C, b, ] using (section13_ellipticSet_completeSquare_mem (Q := Q) (a := a) ( := ) hQ) have hCeq : C = ({b} : Set (Fin n )) + D := by ext x constructor intro hxC have hxD : x - b D := by have hx : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct (x - b) (Q.mulVec (x - b)) := (hcomp x).1 hxC simpa [D] using hx refine b, by simp, x - b, hxD, ?_ abel_nf rintro x, hx, x, hx, rfl have hx' : x = b := by simpa using hx subst hx' have hxineq : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct x (Q.mulVec x) := by simpa [D] using hx have hx : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct ((b + x) - b) (Q.mulVec ((b + x) - b)) := by simpa [add_sub_cancel_left] using hxineq exact (hcomp (b + x)).2 hx have hDne : Set.Nonempty D := by rcases hCne with x, hxC have hx : (1 / 2 : ) * dotProduct (x - b) (Q.mulVec (x - b)) := (hcomp x).1 hxC exact x - b, by simpa [D] using hx have hbdd : BddAbove (Set.image (fun x : Fin n => dotProduct x xStar) ({b} : Set (Fin n ))) := by classical simp [Set.image_singleton] have hbdd : BddAbove (Set.image (fun x : Fin n => dotProduct x xStar) D) := by simpa [D] using (section13_bddAbove_image_dotProduct_centeredSublevel_posDef (Q := Q) ( := ) (xStar := xStar) hQ hnonneg) have hdelta_add : deltaStar (({b} : Set (Fin n )) + D) xStar = deltaStar ({b} : Set (Fin n )) xStar + deltaStar D xStar := by simpa using (section13_deltaStar_add_of_bddAbove (C := ({b} : Set (Fin n ))) (C := D) (xStar := xStar) (hCne := by simp) (hCne := hDne) hbdd hbdd) have hD : deltaStar D xStar = Real.sqrt (2 * * dotProduct xStar ((Q).mulVec xStar)) := by simpa [D] using (section13_deltaStar_centeredSublevel_posDef (Q := Q) ( := ) (xStar := xStar) hQ hnonneg) calc deltaStar C xStar = deltaStar (({b} : Set (Fin n )) + D) xStar := by simp [hCeq] _ = deltaStar ({b} : Set (Fin n )) xStar + deltaStar D xStar := hdelta_add _ = dotProduct xStar b + Real.sqrt (2 * * dotProduct xStar ((Q).mulVec xStar)) := by simp [section13_deltaStar_singleton, hD]
end Section13end Chap03
